thread.title: Win a VIP trip to see Charlie and the Chocolate Factory including a chocolate making workshop hosted by Hotel Chocolat!
thread.title_full: Win a VIP trip to see Charlie and the Chocolate Factory including a chocolate making workshop hosted by Hotel Chocolat! - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a VIP trip to see Charlie and the Chocolate Factory including a chocolate making workshop hosted by Hotel Chocolat!
text: Join luxury cocoa grower and chocolatier Hotel Chocolat on a cocoa journey of discovery with a Bean to Bar workshop, before enjoying a VIP trip to see ROALD DAHLâ€™s deliciously dark tale of young Charlie Bucket and the mysterious confectioner Willy Wonka. Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, directed by Academy Award-winner Sam Mendes, is brought to life with a chocolate garden, an army of squirrels and the curiously peculiar Oompa-Loompas in a gigantic musical choc-full of fantastical treats to dazzle your senses. Competition ends on Monday, 30 November 2015 Terms and Conditions Online Form - Win a VIP trip to see Charlie and the Chocolate Factory including a chocolate making workshop hosted by Hotel Chocolat! telegraph.co.uk
